item.title: 4inROW
item.description:
4inRow is an addictive strategy game where you match wits against an intelligent AI opponent in a race to connect four colored discs in a row - horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. In this digital version of the classic Connect Four concept, youll take turns dropping your pieces onto a 6x7 grid, while the AI strategically plans its counter-moves.?4inRow is an addictive strategy game where you match wits against an intelligent AI opponent in a race to connect four colored discs in a row - horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. item.title: Animal Name Puzzle
item.description:
Animal Name Puzzle is an exciting word scramble game where players must rearrange a set of scrambled letters to form the name of an animal. The game offers a fun challenge by testing both word recognition and knowledge of animals, ranging from common pets to rare wild species. If you get stuck, you can use a hint to help you out. For a fresh twist, the shuffle button lets you change the arrangement of the letters, adding variety to each puzzle. Solve them all and discover a world of animals through this engaging word game!?Animal Name Puzzle is an exciting word scramble game where players must rearrange a set of scrambled letters to form the name of an animal. The game offers a fun challenge by testing both word recognition and knowledge of animals, ranging from common pets to rare wild species. If you get stuck, you can use a hint to help you out. item.title: Animerge
item.description:
Animerge is a twist to the famous Watermelon Suika game. It is a fun and relaxing casual game where players merge cute adorable animals, starting from the tiniest mouse, all the way to the majestic elephant! Merging these animals, while listening to cozy Lo-Fi music and hand drawn art, creates the perfect atmosphere for unwinding. Strategize, and relax in this fun and laid-back adventure while choosing from a list of LoFi music to create your own cozy vibe while merging the cute little animals. P.S. - much more is on the way...!?Animerge is a twist to the famous Watermelon Suika game. item.title: Connect the Pipes: Water Puzzle
item.description:
Dozens of unique levels await you in this exciting puzzle game, where you need to show your logic and ingenuity! There are pipes, water sources and drains on the playing field. Your task is to turn the pipes so that the water from the source reaches the drain. But thats not all! Water comes in different colors, and to complete some levels you will have to mix the streams, creating new colors. Each drain may require a certain color of water, and the difficulty of the levels will increase, offering new mechanics and challenges.?Dozens of unique levels await you in this exciting puzzle game, where you need to show your logic and ingenuity! There are pipes, water sources and drains on the playing field. Your task is to turn the pipes so that the water from the source reaches the drain. But thats not all! Water comes in different colors, and to complete some levels you will have to mix the streams, creating new colors. Each drain may require a certain color of water, and the difficulty of the levels will increase, offering new mechanics and challenges.

item.title: Tafl: Viking Chess
item.description:
A Scandinavian strategy board game that was popular in the Middle Ages. In Scandinavian society, it was comparable to chess. The game has game variants that differ in: - board size: 7, 9, 11, 13 - victory conditions: bring the king to the edge or corner of the board. - king encirclement conditions: from two or four sides. - the number of attacking (black) and defending (white) pieces. You can play the game with artificial intelligence, with another person on one device, or with an opponent online in multiplayer mode. The attacking black pieces move first. Then the players move in turns. All pieces move vertically or horizontally to any num?A Scandinavian strategy board game that was popular in the Middle Ages. item.title: Tile Fruits
item.description:
In Tile Fruits, embark on a delectable adventure packed with vibrant fruits and captivating challenges! This 2D tile-matching game tests your strategic prowess as you aim to connect three identical fruits to advance through progressively difficult levels. Each match removes the fruits from the board, but beware: having more than seven different types of fruits on the board at once results in a loss. The games colorful graphics, adorable fruit designs, and endearing sound effects create an immersive and enjoyable experience.?In Tile Fruits, embark on a delectable adventure packed with vibrant fruits and captivating challenges! This 2D tile-matching game tests your strategic prowess as you aim to connect three identical fruits to advance through progressively difficult levels. Each match removes the fruits from the board, but beware: having more than seven different types of fruits on the board at once results in a loss. The games colorful graphics, adorable fruit designs, and endearing sound effects create an immersive and enjoyable experience.
